description:
Ash demands to have the hostages released, in exchange for sparing Golzine`s life. But that`s when Foxx betrays Golzine. Cain, Sing, and Blanca quickly take action to save the hostages together with Ash. Meanwhile, Eiji, who`s in the hospital, decides to finally head back to Japan, but just can`t seem to get Ash off of his mind...
Source: amazon

titles.title: ライ麦畑でつかまえて
